title: Margarites
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Italian, Western, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers some vegan savory dishes including pasta salads, veggies and a mushroom risotto. Vegan sweets such as apple grandin and cupcakes are available also. Helpful staff will point out the vegan choices. Pleasant serene atmosphere in the middle of a small village high in the mountains.
